item.description:
THERE WILL BE "NO CSI INSTRUCTION OR PRACTICE" AT THE CARVER DEN THIS EVENING THURSDAY JANUARY 6, 2011

CLASS WILL BE HELD BY SARAH TEAGLE


CLASS IS BY INVITATION FOR LEVEL I STEPPERS ONLY, PLEASE CONFIRM YOUR RSVP TO SECURE YOUR SPOT, CLASS SIZE IS LIMITED AND WILL BE HELD AT THE CARVER DEN FROM 6 TO 8 P.M. ON THURSDAY JANUARY 6, 2011

INVITATION IS EXTENDED TO STEPPERS ON THE RSVP LIST ONLY
IF YOU DO NOT PLAN ON PARTICIPATING, PLEASE REMOVE YOUR NAME FROM THE RSVP LIST
THE RSVP LIST WILL BE UPDATED JAN 2, IF YOU HAVE NOT RESPONDED OR PAID $10 DEPOSIT YOUR NAME WILL BE REMOVED FROM THE RSVP LIST ON JAN 3, 2010

PROGRESSIVE CLASS
TOTAL COST $30

COST $10 AIRLINE FEE
$20 CLASS

INVITATION WILL BE EXTENDED TO STEPPERS CONFIRMED AND WHO HAVE PAID DEPOSIT FOR LEVEL I PROVIDED SPACE IS AVAILABLE
THEREFORE: 2 CLASSES AND AIRLINE FEE $60

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin Up Your Game Level I With Sarah Teagle Class Invitational Only
